sentences.en: And third, I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him.
sentences.cn: 第三, 俺毫无条件地,也无可救药地爱上了它.

sentences.en: Based on alternating - direction - implicit method , ADI - FDTD is an unconditionally stable FDTD method.
sentences.cn: 基于交变方向隐式的时域有限差分法(ADI -FDTD )是一种无条件稳定的FDTD算法.

sentences.en: But of course, we also want to be loved - we want to be rewarded unconditionally without any contingencies whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 但当然，我们都想被喜爱,-我们都想无条件的得到报酬,没有任何别的可能。

sentences.en: From today on, let's start to love ourselves, unconditionally!
sentences.cn: 从今天开始, 让我们去全心全意地爱自己.

sentences.en: Further, MFN treatment has to be extended to all members unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 另外, 最惠国待遇应无条件地寄予所有成员国.

sentences.en: I promised to anyone regardless of age disability unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 我无条件答应任何人不论年龄病残.

sentences.en: I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him.
sentences.cn: 我毫无条件地、无可救药地爱上了他.

sentences.en: If violates obeys the penalty which unconditionally opposite party gives.
sentences.cn: 若违反无条件服从对方给予的惩罚.

sentences.en: It makes things very awkward to have your girls going back unconditionally just now!
sentences.cn: 你们现在是无条件上工,真糟糕!

sentences.en: Just as you love me unconditionally, I love you just the same.
sentences.cn: 就像你无条件地爱我一样, 我也会无条件地爱我.

sentences.en: Learn to love yourself unconditionally before accepting unconditional love!
sentences.cn: 接受无条件的爱之前学会无条件地爱自己.
不对，他崇拜你，无条件地。

sentences.en: Required reserve is compulsory and must be observed unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 准备金是强制性的,必须无条件地遵守.

sentences.en: To give unconditionally and not to takea marriage.
sentences.cn: 无条件为对方付出,而不是索取.

sentences.en: Unconditionally secure asymmetric encryption schemes based on polynomials and cover free family ( CFF ) .
sentences.cn: 我的翻译是:基于多项式和“ CFF ”的绝对安全的非对称性加密方案.

sentences.en: Whether you need her, she will love you unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 不论你是否需要她, 她都会无条件地爱着你.

sentences.en: You can restore an AP DS 0 conditionally or unconditionally.
sentences.cn: 可以有条件地或无条件地恢复APDS0.

words.tran_cn: 无条件的；绝对的；无限制的
